overview:
Shane Hudson is the founder of Success Circuit, a blog that’s main focus is to motivate and inspire people to do the best they can in business and life itself.

Shane is a very interesting character as he is young but harbours a massive wealth of knowledge that is very uncommon. He is interested in many things, including: Programming, Website Development, Drama, Psychology, Philosophy and Helping People. The aura he has about himself is very spectacular and would motivate many people by just being there.

He has also had a lot of experience such as studying with The Open University, which few under the age of 16 have ever managed, and running his last blog which was called Lonely Designs. He often speaks of what he learned from his last blog, which many would call a failure but he calls it a success as it gave him knowledge of the world.
